channel.title: Merry Christmas and a happy new board order :)
channel.description:
We've been wanting to rework the board order of the community for a while, and now we've finally came to a conclusive decision on which way we want to go with it. The board order has been implemented and we look forward to your feedback on these changes. The debates boards have also been merged and added as a child board under general discussion, some of the board descriptions will change in the coming days as well.
On an unrelated note I'd like to take this opportunity to wish you all a Merry Christmas from the staff team here at Mopar, we hope you have a great time and look forward to the new year :)

item.source: Merry Christmas and a happy new board order :)

item.title: Merry Christmas and a happy new board order :)
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:35, topic:537440”][quote author=sinisoul link=topic=655598.msg4389152#msg4389152 date=1386812561]

Why can’t we add new content AND rearrange the boards? They aren’t mutually exclusive, and trying to say it’s a bad idea to rearrange boards because we need new content doesn’t make any sense. As for removing MITB and creating all the boards on MPSC, that’s not going to happen, Moparisthebest is completely against it.

Here’s my version of your changed board structure since I dont think you can see that section Flame:

[tt]Announcements
- MoparScape Announcements

General
- General Discussion
- General Questions
- Homework Help
- Debates
- Community Suggestions
- Resolved Suggestions

Interests & Hobbies
- Games
- General Game Discussion
- RuneScape
- Oldschool Runescape
- MineCraft
- MoparCraft Discussion
- MoparCraft Infraction Reports
- MineCraft Discussion
- MineCraft Server Advertisements
- Server Status Page
- General Programming
- Game Development
- Web Design/Development
- Graphics
- Tutorials
- Requests & Help
- Reviews and Multimedia

Private Server Advertising
- Server Advertisements
- Server Status Page
- Sponsored Server Applications

Private Server Development
- Server and Client Development Showoff
- Downloads
- Download Requests
- Server Help
- Server Tutorials
- Featured Tutorials
- Snippets
- Client Help
- Client Modificaton Tutorials
- Custom Models
- Requests and help
- Development Teams

RuneScape Classic
- Advertisements
- RSC Server and Client Help
- RSC Server Development/Discussion
- MoparClassic[/tt]

This is actually pretty well thought out. I like it.

[/quote]

Dont like it.

[quote author=casey. link=topic=656261.msg4391846#msg4391846 date=1387815529]
the support for this is overwhelming, im glad you guys consulted the community about this beforehand.
[/quote]people like to bitch[/quote]

Feels strange. But it was very well thought out.

Read full topic
item.source: Merry Christmas and a happy new board order :)

item.title: Merry Christmas and a happy new board order :)
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Boards hidden in categorys hidden in more categorys wich are themselfs subcategorys of categorys. Nice clusterfudge ya’ll made.

Reminds of those russian dolls that you can open up and voila theres another doll inside, wich goes on and on and on till you get fooking sick of it.

Jezus loves you.

I’m done ranting about stuff idgaf, merry christmas.

Read full topic

@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“sinisoul, post:40, topic:536783”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=655598.msg4388992#msg4388992 date=1386758746]
Why can’t we add new content AND rearrange the boards? They aren’t mutually exclusive, and trying to say it’s a bad idea to rearrange boards because we need new content doesn’t make any sense. As for removing MITB and creating all the boards on MPSC, that’s not going to happen, Moparisthebest is completely against it.

Here’s my version of your changed board structure since I dont think you can see that section Flame:

[tt]Announcements
- MoparScape Announcements

General
- General Discussion

- Homework Help

Interests & Hobbies

Private Server Advertising

Private Server Development

RuneScape Classic

- RSC Server Development/Discussion
- MoparClassic[/tt]

[/quote]

This is actually pretty well thought out. I like it.[/quote]

item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

mr extremez:

I don’t like the new board order tbh, but I’ll get used to it. One thing I think should be changed is Runescape should be a board in games instead of a child board because the Runescape board is already dead enough, it will just become more dead if it is a child board. Also Merry Christmas everyone!

keeping an almost dead board as a board isn’t a good idea. It’s great the way it is in my opinion.
